entry.title: About Me
entry.content:
Hello, I am Hanlin Dai

You can also call me Herring, that's my english name. I graduated from Zhejiang University - City College in 2014. My major is electronic information engineering, and i participated in some college research projects during the university time. Such as Multi-Touch & Freescale Smart car , I joined a student research organization called â€œDebugâ€ and make some projects though programming via Single-Chip Microcomputer.

Records during university time


About design

I got in touch with 3D design during my senior year in university, I am totally obsessed with a design software called 3D maxï¼I started to learn knowledge of design with teachers from creative college in our university.

Early self-study works during university time

Oh! that is really great software! After that, I opened the door to design, I prefer design to hardware programming (aha~emmmï½ğŸ¤”Maybe just because design is easier than programming). But to be honest, I love design & create.

After graduating from university, I got in touch the internet industry, working in the internet industry as a UX designer. In these years of work, I have served different companies and products. I am very grateful for the help that my former team gave me.ğŸ˜˜

Below are some companies that I have served before

I am a designer who hopes to use design methods to help business strategies succeed

Hanlin Daiï¼ˆHerringï¼‰
2021-02-13

entry.title: Design for Lark @Bytedance
entry.content:
I joined ByteDance in 2019 as a UX designer. The project I focus on named Lark, chinese name Feishu. The team I am working for named ESUX, ES(Enterprise and Service) is committed to promoting business development in terms of tools and services. ESUX is the design team subordinate to ES(Enterprise and Service).

What's Lark?

Essential Work Tools, Seamless Connection

We believe your work is shaped by the tools you use. Lark integrates messaging, video conferencing, schedule management, collaborative documents, cloud storage, email, and workflow applications to provide a seamless collaboration experience on all your devices.

If you wanna learn more about Lark, click this Home page link

Working at Bytedance

I am taking the roles as an interviewer, a mentor, and an connector person (connector person means vertical cooperation on the business side) in bytedance.

Currently, I am in charge of the AC business line of Lark, the full name is "Admin and Control", which includes 2 partsï¼š

1. Admin
2. Passport

Another business line i am focusing on is User Growth. In the UG business line, I cooperate with the business product manager and use different kinds of testing methods, such as ABtest, looking for the best design strategy to help the business get good data results.

I cannot show too many design strategy of my work because of the confidentiality agreement. But, welcome to experience LARK ğŸ˜˜

Viewpoints and experiences I have summed up during the time working in bytedanceï¼š

  • It's necessary to try to prove the value of design, but it's more important to help the business succeed
  • The design strategy should be derived from business background rationality and logical, just like the deduction of a mathematical conclusion
  • Communication focuses on presenting objective facts, not your point of view

About my design teamâ€”â€”ESUX

Our design team (ESUX) is a team of design talents with diverse background and from leading companies worldwide. Currently, we have offices in Beijing, Shanghai, Shenzhen, Guangdong, Chengdu, Hangzhou, Wuhan, San Francisco and Singapore. Our team is looking for multiple designer roles to help shape the future of Bytedance.

entry.title: Design for Shanghai Jiao Tong University FDT financial laboratory
entry.summary: A coffee shop with perfect financial functions, an exchange with comfortable environment, and a financial club with first-class resources and equipment.
entry.content:
A coffee shop with perfect financial functions, an exchange with comfortable environment, and a financial club with first-class resources and equipment.

This is the first time for me to design Offline space.

When I worked for "FDT" in 2016, I had the opportunity to participate in material and screen design for Shanghai Jiao Tong University.

Aa comfortable environment comparable to chill cafe space and a trading system comparable to the exchange. It can be said that he is the first version of the Stock Exchange in campus.

Below is the stock display screen and offline materials I designed
